title: Introduction
content: Introduction This site provides free enterprise activation services for the full range of Windows operating systems and Office suites. Therefore, in order to maintain the operation and maintenance of our site and servers, please do not block the advertisements on this site. This is our only source of income. Thank you for your understanding. At present, the Internet is full of various Windows and Office activation programs. Most of these programs contain Trojan horses. Ordinary users can easily be remotely controlled by malicious people after using the activation programs on the Internet without their knowledge. Usually, this control method is very concealed, and it is secretly monitoring the user's every move at the system level, including our privacy data. When our computer is invaded by a virus, the intruder may use our privacy data to sell to a third party to obtain illegal income, or may use our computer resources as a "mining machine" to invade our network and hardware resources in real time, and more extreme It will be extortion. Similar incidents have occurred many times in the past few years. For the above reasons, we decided to open up our internal activation service for everyone to use for free. Of course, for friends with conditions, we still recommend buying genuine operating systems and office suites-even though it will cost a lot of money. The activation service provided by this site is realized through enterprise volume authorization. The whole process does not require the installation of any programs or plug-ins on the computer, so it can ensure the security and reliability of the activation process. The activation process only requires the computer to be connected to the Internet. The activation period is usually 180 days. Before the expiration, the operating system or office suite will automatically renew the activation days. Generally speaking, through our enterprise volume authorization service, you can enjoy the same experience as genuine operating systems and office suites. Next, browse the navigation menu on the left, find the guide that matches your operating system or office suite version, and follow the guide to operate it.

title: Office 2016​
content: 文件名	操作 Office Professional Plus 2016 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Chinese-Simplified)	下 载

content: 文件名	操作 Office Professional Plus 2019 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Chinese-Simplified)	下 载

title: Set the Office Key Management Service Host​
content: In the Office 2016 installation directory, type powershell or cmd, and press the Enter key on your keyboard. Here's an example using PowerShell:  In the pop-up window, enter the following command: cscript ospp.vbs /sethst:kms.freetouser.com  The above command will set the KMS host to kms.freetouser.com. After the setting is successful, the command line will print a sentence Successfully applied setting., indicating that the setting is successful. If everything goes smoothly, you will see the following output:

title: Activate the Office Suite​
content: We'll continue with Office 2016 as an example and enter the following command: cscript ospp.vbs /act  This command activates Office 2016. If everything goes smoothly, you will see the following output: PS C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office16> cscript ospp.vbs /act Microsoft (R) Windows Script Host Version 5.812 版权所有(C) Microsoft Corporation。保留所有权利。 ---Processing-------------------------- --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: 041a06cb-c5b8-4772-809f-416d03d16654 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16PublisherVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: 8K837 <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: 4f414197-0fc2-4c01-b68a-86cbb9ac254c LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16ProjectProVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: G83KT <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: 67c0fc0c-deba-401b-bf8b-9c8ad8395804 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16AccessVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: QPFDW <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: 6bf301c1-b94a-43e9-ba31-d494598c47fb LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16VisioProVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: RJRJK <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: bb11badf-d8aa-470e-9311-20eaf80fe5cc LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16WordVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: 3PFJ6 <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: c3e65d36-141f-4d2f-a303-a842ee756a29 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16ExcelVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: 7FTBF <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: d70b1bba-b893-4544-96e2-b7a318091c33 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16PowerPointVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: BY6C6 <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: d8cace59-33d2-4ac7-9b1b-9b72339c51c8 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16OneNoteVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: XW3J6 <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: da7ddabc-3fbe-4447-9e01-6ab7440b4cd4 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16ProjectStdVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: KQBVC <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product: SKU ID: ec9d9265-9d1e-4ed0-838a-cdc20f2551a1 LICENSE NAME: Office 16, Office16OutlookVL_KMS_Client edition LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 16, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel Last 5 characters of installed product key: 6MT9B <Product activation successful> --------------------------------------- --------------------------------------- ---Exiting-----------------------------  The above output indicates that all products of the Office 2016 suite have been successfully activated. We can see that the LICENSE NAME list includes various products of Office 2016, such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc. The <Product activation successful> behind each product indicates that the product has been successfully activated.

title: Check the Activation Status of the Office Suite​
content: We can also check the licensing status of the Office Suite. Enter the following command: cscript ospp.vbs /dstatus  This command uses the cscript tool to run the ospp.vbs script and displays detailed licensing information for Microsoft Office software, including license type, activation status, expiration date, etc. This command is usually used to check the licensing status of the current Microsoft Office software to confirm whether the software has been successfully activated. At this point, we have successfully activated the Office 2016 suite. tip If you have Office 2019 or Office 2022 installed on your computer, you can activate them using the same method. If you don't have Office installed on your computer, you can download the supported original Office Suite from here.

title: Installing the Product Key​
content: If you want to convert a computer from a KMS host, MAK, or retail version of Windows to a KMS client, install the applicable product key (GVLK) from the following list. To install the client product key, open PowerShell or CMD on the client. Here's an example using PowerShell - run PowerShell as an administrator:  In PowerShell, enter the following command and press Enter: slmgr /ipk <product key>  As an example, let's use the Windows 11 Education edition system, enter the following command and press the Enter key on your keyboard: slmgr /ipk 6TP4R-GNPTD-KYYHQ-7B7DP-J447Y  The 6TP4R-GNPTD-KYYHQ-7B7DP-J447Y after /ipk is the product key. You can find the product key for the corresponding version here. This means to install the 6TP4R-GNPTD-KYYHQ-7B7DP-J447Y product key. If everything goes smoothly, you will see the following message:  At this point, we have successfully installed the product key. Next, we will activate the system.

title: Connect to the KMS Server​
content: After installing the product key, we need to connect to the KMS server. Here, we use the KMS server we provide. slmgr /skms kms.freetouser.com  The kms.freetouser.com after /skms is the KMS server address we provide. This means to connect to the kms.freetouser.com KMS server. If everything goes smoothly, you will see the following message:  After seeing this message, we have successfully connected to the KMS server.

title: Activate the System​
content: After connecting to the KMS server, we need to activate the system. Here, we use the following command: slmgr /ato  The /ato above is the command to activate the system. If everything goes smoothly, you will see the following message:  We see that the prompt box displays "Product activated successfully.", indicating that we have successfully activated the system. We can open the system settings to further check the activation status:  We see that the system displays "Activated". This means that we have successfully activated the system. Through the KMS server we provide, you can activate systems such as Windows 10, Windows 11, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2022, etc., with an activation period of 180 days. When the activation period expires, the system will automatically reactivate. tip If you want to install a new Windows system, you can find supported Windows system images here. The images provided by this site are original images without any modifications, so you can use them with confidence.
